post.description: Authenticate user and get JWT token
Refresh the JWT token for continued access

put.description:
PUT /api/cart/update
Update product quantity in cart

delete.description:
DELETE /api/cart/remove/{product_id}
Remove a product from cart

DELETE /api/cart/clear
Clear the current user's cart

delete.description: Delete a specific category by ID

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid JWT token
